languages.text: {n}Высокая седовласая женщина в упор взирает на своего собеседника — киберглаз сверкает алым.{/n} "Тогда предложи иной вариант, который меня устроит. Я описала ситуацию — ничуть не хуже, чем мог бы описать ее мой сенешаль. Прими решение: что ты будешь делать с Айоном-VI, Эдельтрад?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Высокая седовласая женщина в упор взирает на своего собеседника — киберглаз сверкает алым.{/n} "Тогда предложи иной вариант, который меня устроит. Я описала ситуацию — ничуть не хуже, чем мог бы описать ее мой сенешаль. Прими решение: что ты будешь делать с Айоном-VI, Эдельтрад?"

languages.text: {n}The tall, grey-haired woman pins him with her gaze, her cybernetic eye flashing crimson.{/n} "Then suggest an alternative that will satisfy me. I have described the situation — no worse than my Seneschal could have done. Make a decision: what will you do with Aion VI, Edelthrad?"
languages.original_text: {n}Высокая седовласая женщина в упор взирает на своего собеседника — киберглаз сверкает алым.{/n} "Тогда предложи иной вариант, который меня устроит. Я описала ситуацию — ничуть не хуже, чем мог бы описать ее мой сенешаль. Прими решение: что ты будешь делать с Айоном-VI, Эдельтрад?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The tall, grey-haired woman pins him with her gaze, her cybernetic eye flashing crimson.{/n} "Then suggest a different option that will satisfy me. I have described the situation — no worse than my Seneschal could have done. Make a decision: what will you do with Aion-VI, Edelthrad?"

{n}The tall, grey-haired woman pins him with her gaze, her cybernetic eye flashing crimson.{/n} "Then suggest a different option that will satisfy me. I have described the situation — no worse than my Seneschal could have done. Make a decision: what will you do with Aion-VI, Edelthrad?"

{n}The tall, grey-haired woman pins him with her gaze, her cybernetic eye flashing crimson.{/n} "Then suggest an alternative that will satisfy me. I have described the situation — no worse than my Seneschal could have done. Make a decision: what will you do with Aion VI, Edelthrad?"

{n}The tall, grey-haired woman pins him with her gaze, her cybernetic eye flashing crimson.{/n} "Then suggest an alternative that will satisfy me. I have described the situation — no worse than my Seneschal could have done. Make a decision: what will you do with Aion VI, Edelthrad?"

{n}The tall, grey-haired woman pins him with her gaze, her cybernetic eye flashing crimson.{/n} "Then suggest an alternative that will satisfy me. I have described the situation — no worse than my Seneschal could have done. Make a decision: what will you do with Aion VI, Edelthrad?"

languages.text: {n}一位身材高大的灰发女性凝视着他，电子眼闪烁着深红色的光芒。{/n}“那就提出一个让我满意的替代方案吧。情况我已经都说清楚了，你的方案不能逊色于我的总领提出的方案。做个决定吧，你会如何处理艾恩六号星的情况，艾德萨德？”
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, grey-haired woman pins him with her gaze, her cybernetic eye flashing crimson.{/n} "Then suggest an alternative that will satisfy me. I have described the situation — no worse than my Seneschal could have done. Make a decision: what will you do with Aion VI, Edelthrad?"

traits.locale_text: {n}一位身材高大的灰发女性凝视着他，电子眼闪烁着深红色的光芒。{/n}“那就提出一个让我满意的替代方案吧。情况我已经都说清楚了，你的方案不能逊色于我的总领提出的方案。做个决定吧，你会如何处理艾恩六号星的情况，艾德萨德？”

languages.text: {n}La mujer, alta y canosa, le mira fijamente con un ojo cibernético que emite destellos escarlatas.{/n} «Pues sugiere una alternativa que me satisfaga. Te he explicado la situación con tanto detalle como haría mi Senescal. Toma una decisión: ¿qué harás con Aion VI, Edelthrad?».
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, grey-haired woman pins him with her gaze, her cybernetic eye flashing crimson.{/n} "Then suggest an alternative that will satisfy me. I have described the situation — no worse than my Seneschal could have done. Make a decision: what will you do with Aion VI, Edelthrad?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La mujer, alta y canosa, le mira fijamente con un ojo cibernético que emite destellos escarlatas.{/n} «Pues sugiere una alternativa que me satisfaga. Te he explicado la situación con tanto detalle como haría mi Senescal. Toma una decisión: ¿qué harás con Aion VI, Edelthrad?».

languages.text: {n}背の高い白髪の女性の視線は彼を釘付けにし、彼女のサイバネティックな目が深紅に点滅する。{/n}「それでは、私が満足できる代替案を提案してくれ。私は、家令長が説明できるよりも悪くないぐらい状況を説明した。決断してください。アイオン・VIをどうする、エデルスラド？」
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, grey-haired woman pins him with her gaze, her cybernetic eye flashing crimson.{/n} "Then suggest an alternative that will satisfy me. I have described the situation — no worse than my Seneschal could have done. Make a decision: what will you do with Aion VI, Edelthrad?"

traits.locale_text: {n}背の高い白髪の女性の視線は彼を釘付けにし、彼女のサイバネティックな目が深紅に点滅する。{/n}「それでは、私が満足できる代替案を提案してください。私は状況を説明しました。私の家令長がしたかもしれないことよりも悪くはない。決断してください。アイオン・VIをどうしますか、エデルスラド？」
{n}背の高い白髪の女性の視線は彼を釘付けにし、彼女のサイバネティックな目が深紅に点滅する。{/n}「それでは、私が満足できる代替案を提案してくれ。私は、家令長が説明できるよりも悪くないぐらい状況を説明した。決断してください。アイオン・VIをどうする、エデルスラド？」

languages.text: {n}La grande femme aux cheveux argentés le fixe du regard, son œil cybernétique étincelant d'un éclat cramoisi.{/n} « Dans ce cas, proposez-moi une alternative satisfaisante. Je vous ai décrit la situation, au moins aussi bien que mon sénéchal aurait pu le faire. Prenez une décision : que comptez-vous faire d'Éon-VI, Edelthrad ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, grey-haired woman pins him with her gaze, her cybernetic eye flashing crimson.{/n} "Then suggest an alternative that will satisfy me. I have described the situation — no worse than my Seneschal could have done. Make a decision: what will you do with Aion VI, Edelthrad?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La grande femme aux cheveux argentés le fixe du regard, son œil cybernétique étincelant d'un éclat cramoisi.{/n} « Dans ce cas, proposez-moi une alternative satisfaisante. Je vous ai décrit la situation, au moins aussi bien que mon sénéchal aurait pu le faire. Prenez une décision : que comptez-vous faire d'Éon-VI, Edelthrad ? »

languages.text: {n}Die große, grauhaarige Frau fixiert ihn mit ihrem Blick, ihr kybernetisches Auge flackert rot.{/n} "Dann schlagt eine Alternative vor, die mich zufriedenstellt. Ich habe die Situation dargelegt – nicht schlechter, als mein Truchsess es getan hätte. Trefft eine Entscheidung: Was soll mit Aion VI geschehen, Edelthrad?"
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, grey-haired woman pins him with her gaze, her cybernetic eye flashing crimson.{/n} "Then suggest an alternative that will satisfy me. I have described the situation — no worse than my Seneschal could have done. Make a decision: what will you do with Aion VI, Edelthrad?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die große, grauhaarige Frau fixiert ihn mit ihrem Blick, ihr kybernetisches Auge flackert rot.{/n} "Dann schlagt eine Alternative vor, die mich zufriedenstellt. Ich habe die Situation dargelegt – nicht schlechter, als mein Truchsess es getan hätte. Trefft eine Entscheidung: Was soll mit Aion VI geschehen, Edelthrad?"

languages.text: {n}Uzun boylu ve kır saçlı kadın, bakışlarıyla adamı âdeta olduğu yere mıhlıyor. Sibernetik gözü kızıl kızıl parlıyor.{/n} "O hâlde beni tatmin edecek bir alternatif bul. Vaziyeti anlattım, Seneşalimin elinden gelebilecekten daha beter değil. Bir karar ver: Aion VI ile ne yapacaksın Edelthrad?"
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, grey-haired woman pins him with her gaze, her cybernetic eye flashing crimson.{/n} "Then suggest an alternative that will satisfy me. I have described the situation — no worse than my Seneschal could have done. Make a decision: what will you do with Aion VI, Edelthrad?"

Vaziyeti anlattım, Seneşal'imin elinden gelebilecekten daha beter değil. Bir karar ver: Aion VI ile ne yapacaksın Edelthrad?"
